duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage multiple briefings from start to finish and act as the single point of contact to sales and services counterparts.
Interact with all levels of employees, serving as a liaison between the account owner and the various Workmates needed to fulfill the agenda for each briefing event.
Manage day-to-day customer briefings involving various internal teams as well as high-level external customers.
Provide heavy scheduling support, including calendar invites and outreach to various teams to confirm availability.
Follow a pre-determined process to draft agendas, schedule against those agendas, and host meetings on the day they take place.
Juggle various competing timelines and ensure each event stays on track and on time.
Confidently push back on account teams when necessary to ensure the best possible outcome for the briefing.
Collaborate closely with CXC team, technology support team, logistics team, catering, etc. to bring all elements of the briefing together.
Communicate at an executive level via email, phone, Slack, etc.
Manage additional special projects as needed by the CXC team.
Support in developing ongoing best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
